DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety profile treatment effect Isolagen TherapyTM subject maxillary lesion treat previous study ( IT-G-002 )
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Isolagen TherapyTM Treatment Interdental Papillary Insufficiency
DOC.criteria: Subject must 1870 year age Subject treat ITG002 Subject maxillary interproximal recession defect Natural teeth must present side area treat Negative pregnancy test use acceptable birth control ( female childbearing age ) Subjects participated clinical trial within 30 day prior enrollment Interproximal space include root groove furcation must involve Subjects poor oral hygiene Subjects systemic condition , would preclude periodontal treatment Subjects acute infectious lesion treatment area Subjects open interproximal contact study sit Subjects must receive prophylactic antibiotic dental procedure Subjects chronic antibiotic steroidal therapy Subjects interproximal probe depths > 3 mm around study lesion Subjects smoke Subjects take medication associate development drug induce gingival hyperplasia Subjects radiographic evidence pathology Subjects tooth mobility exceed score 1 Subjects parafunctional habit wear bite guard Subjects interproximal space associate teeth without adequate zone keratinize tissue Subjects etiology interproximal papillary recession control Subjects receive crown pontic one teeth involve interproximal space treat
